name: KeepMoviEZ
tagline: Your personal movie log, tracker and analytics with much more features
description: A comprehensive movie tracking application that allows users to log films they have watched, create custom watchlists, discover new movies based on their viewing history, and much more.

name: Header Showcase
tagline: Exploring HTML headings with real-world examples.
description: A simple HTML and CSS project that demonstrates the usage of different heading levels h1â€“h6.

name: List of Formulae
tagline: A concise collection of Physics and Chemistry formulas.
description: A simple web page demonstrating the use of unordered and ordred lists in HTML to create a list of Physics and Chemistry formulas.

name: JSON & Icon Prompt Generator
tagline: A tool to generate project metadata and creative icon prompts.
description: This project uses Google's Gemini AI model to generate JSON metadata and creative icon prompts based on provided HTML and CSS and JavaScript code.

name: Table of Constants
tagline: A visual representation of fundamental scientific constants.
description: A simple HTML and CSS project displaying and demonstrating the use of table in html creating a table of important universal constants in physics.

name: PCM Quiz
tagline: A simple quiz focusing on Physics, Chemistry, and Math.
description: A basic HTML quiz designed to demonstrate different types of forms elements in HTML.

name: Border Animation
tagline: A simple CSS project showcasing animated borders around a text card.
description: This project demonstrates animated border effect using CSS. It features a card with rotating colorful borders created using conic gradients and keyframe animations.

name: Snippet Flow
tagline: A tool to render, clean, download code blocks from markdown text.
description: A web-based tool that takes Markdown code snippets and renders them with better formatting in a user-friendly interface. Features: Paste, clear, and render code, Toggle for auto-pasting, Copy rendered output to clipboard, download the code block.

name: Genre Picker
tagline: A JavaScript-based genre selection tool with filtering and tag management.
description: An interactive genre selection tool implemented in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Features include dynamic filtering, adding new genres, removing selected genres, and a user-friendly tag-based interface.  Uses Bootstrap for styling and Font Awesome for icons.

name: Wishlist
tagline: An offline-first wishlist and goal planning application, that helps you organize your desires and achieve your goals.
description: Wishlist is an application designed to help users create and manage their personal wishlists and track their goals. It offers a user-friendly interface with features like adding items, setting goal dates, managing prices and store links, and organizing wishes with tags.

name: Html Links
tagline: An interactive guide to understanding and navigating HTML links. Explore physics, chemistry, and math resources with ease.
description: This project provides a simple HTML page with links to various educational resources. It demonstrates the use of html anchor tags

name: PWA Icon
tagline: Generate PWA icons effortlessly. Upload an image and create icons in various sizes for your progressive web app.
description: A simple and intuitive tool to generate icons for Progressive Web Apps. Users can upload an image and the application will create icons in multiple sizes required for PWA implementation. It also provides a convenient download all as ZIP feature.

name: Space Fabric
tagline: Space Fabric Visualizer is an interactive simulation where you can explore celestial mechanics and gravitational forces.
description: Space Fabric is an interactive visualizer that simulates celestial mechanics and gravitational interactions. Users can add planets, black holes, and other celestial bodies to observe their interactions. It allows users to modify parameters like mass, radius, velocity, and explore grid deformations caused by gravity.

name: Momoholics
tagline: Experience flavour that wraps around your heart! Discover the best Momo in Nepal.
description: Momoholics is an online platform dedicated to delivering the best momo in Nepal. Users can explore the menu, place orders, and enjoy fast delivery services. The application provides features such as user authentication, a shopping cart, and profile management to enhance the overall customer experience.

name: Vertex Foundry
tagline: Your guided path to becoming a proficient web developer. Complete projects sequentially to unlock the next challenge.
description: Vertex Foundry is a comprehensive curriculum designed to guide aspiring web developers. It offers a sequential learning path, unlocking new challenges as projects are completed. The platform features focus and browse modes, a progress tracker, and a curriculum built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The goal is to provide a structured and engaging learning experience.

name: Multimedia Showcase
tagline: An interactive showcase of multimedia elements demonstrating scientific and mathematical concepts. It combines images and videos to enhance understanding.
description: This project is a multimedia showcase designed to present fundamental concepts from science and mathematics in an engaging way. It incorporates images and videos to visually explain ideas. The layout is clean and simple, focusing on educational content. The project provides a hands-on learning experience.

name: Article
tagline: An interactive exploration of electromagnetism, illustrating fundamental principles through a hands-on experiment.
description: This project showcases an article on electromagnetism, explaining concepts like magnetic fields and forces. It features a simple experiment demonstrating magnetic deflection. The layout is designed with clear sections and an aside for related information, providing an engaging learning experience.
